body_html:
I encountered the same error:

aurora@aurora-alienware:~$ ldd /usr/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so | grep cuda
	libcudart-f7fdd8d7.so.9.0 => /usr/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcudart-f7fdd8d7.so.9.0 (0x00007ff526f6d000)
	libcudart.so.8.0 => not found

body:
I encountered the same error: 
```
aurora@aurora-alienware:~$ ldd /usr/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so | grep cuda
	libcudart-f7fdd8d7.so.9.0 => /usr/software/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/lib/libcudart-f7fdd8d7.so.9.0 (0x00007ff526f6d000)
	libcudart.so.8.0 => not found

```
